name: Dex Based Cleric 10 APR Assassin (Cleric 25 / Monk 6 / Assassin 9)
author: Orion

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Here's a build draft I made aiming for a dex based cleric / monk / assassin.

Its time I take myself away from the comfort of strength based dev crit warriors

Dual Kama ITWF Undispellable cleric evilness (apart from Mords/Breaches)

Assassin 9 for 5d6 death attack combined with 10 APR and undispellable improved invisibility

Balanced saves, all above 25 combined with evasion deflect arrows

Naked AC 34. 

Base AB 25 + 9 + 4 = 38

Maybe done before. Anyway this is what I've cooked up

Could have gone Cleric 32 / Monk 6 / Assassin 2 for extra great wisdom (including Wis AC) and extra caster levels but I think the extra death attack damage would be welcome

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
A favourite of mine is the dex based Cleric 26/ Monk 9/ SD5 with Epic dodge and Trickery domain.
You get an undispellable Improved Invisibility from cleric, and cleric buffs provide more than enough AB and weapon damage.
But I guess that takes us back to Yar Stardawg and his Priest of the Shadows from february 28th 2005.
I played a character with that class and level spread on the Anchorome PW from december 2005. Max is also very fond of that build type and has posted his "Shadow Priest" build both here and also in the old build archive back in 2010.
But enough rant and nostalgia.

I like your effort on exploring new dexers the way you have done recently. As for this build, taking assassin to lvl 9 is indeed one of my "sweet spots" for minor multiclassing assassins. Cleric is very strong for dex builds because of all the damage buffs that overcome the lack of strength based damage bonus for dexers in general. Monk is ideal for dex clerics since you get an AC bonus from both wisdom and dexterity, and because you can use Kamas with the monk attack progression.
Keep up the good work!
